ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ لَا تَوْجَلْ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'Do not be afraid. We bring you the good news of a boy of great knowledge.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Have no fear," they said. "We bring you news of a son full of wisdom."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They said: "Do not feel afraid, for we give you the good news of a wise boy."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They replied, "Do not be afraid. We have brought you the glad news of (the birth) of a learned son".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “Do not fear – we convey to you the glad tidings of a knowledgeable boy.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "Do not be afraid! We bring you the good news of a boy possessing much knowledge and wisdom."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: Be not afraid, surely we give you the good news of a boy, possessing knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'Be not afraid; behold, we give thee good tidings of a cunning boy.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: Be not afraid! Lo! we bring thee good tidings of a boy possessing wisdom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They said, "Do not be afraid. We come to you with good news. You shall have a son who shall be endowed with great knowledge."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: be not afraid; verily we bear thou the glad tidings of a boy knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘Do not be afraid. Indeed we give you the good news of a wise son.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "Fear not! We give thee glad tidings of a son endowed with wisdom."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They (the angels) said: "Do not be afraid! We give you glad tidings of a boy (son) possessing much knowledge and wisdom."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do not be afraid' they answered. 'We come to give you glad tidings of a knowledgeable child'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “Do not fear; we bring you good news of a boy endowed with knowledge.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [The angels] said, "Fear not. Indeed, we give you good tidings of a learned boy."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:53] They said, ‘Do not be afraid; lo!, we, are the messengers of your Lord [sent to], give you good tidings of a knowledgeable boy’, one very knowledgeable [boy], namely, Isaac — as we mentioned in sūrat Hūd [Q. 11:69].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said: Be not afraid!) do not be scared of us, Abraham! (Lo! we bring you good tidings of a boy possessing wisdom) in his tender years, clement in his old age.
